mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item(order_group_id, title, detail, image, count, price, link, order_time, status, status_changed_time, company) VALUES (#{orderGroupId}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{image}, #{count}, #{price}, #{link}, #{orderTime}, #{status}, #{statusChangedTime}, #{company})
mapper.select: SELECT oi.* FROM order_item oi JOIN order_group og ON oi.order_group_id = og.id WHERE og.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_item oi JOIN order_group og ON oi.order_group_id = og.id WHERE og.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_item SET status='구매확정', status_changed_time=NOW() WHERE status = '배송완료' AND status_changed_time <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
